query.name: findAllByStudyIdAndRoleId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM MASK WHERE STUDY_ID = ? AND ROLE_ID = ? AND STATUS_ID = 1

query.name: findAllByRoleId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM MASK WHERE ROLE_ID = ? AND STATUS_ID = 1

query.name: findAllByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM MASK WHERE STUDY_ID = ? AND STATUS_ID = 1
